name: The adventure of G-Rex: Attack of the grumpy sweets
name_original: The adventure of G-Rex: Attack of the grumpy sweets
description:
Shoot the enemies with love and release them from the giant evil gummy bear!

Take care of Cake Island by defeating the evil nomnoms. Defeat Gummo and save the island!

This Game is made with a lot of love by 4 friends. Best experience on the downloadable version.

Follow us on twitter!

  • Art: DrSmey
  • Art: Louie Jams
  • Sound: Noggi
  • Programming: Akumi On Bass
